title: Police search for grey SUV after teen shot
content:
CINCINNATI (WKRC) - Police were looking for a grey SUV Wednesday night, January 11, after a 17-year-old was shot in the abdomen.
It happened just before 9 p.m. in Bond Hill. The teenager was alert and talking to First Responders on the way to the hospital.
It was not clear Wednesday night what led to the shooting.
